alert.note: Alert for Coahoma; Panola; Quitman; Tallahatchie (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 6:40PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Coahoma, northern Tallahatchie, Quitman and southwestern Panola Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 639 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rome, or near Parchman, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tutwiler, Marks, Lambert, Crowder, Webb, Sumner, Pope, Belen, Dublin, Vance, Darling, Curtis Station, Falcon, Mattson, Counts, Mims, Barksdale, Denton, Asa and Sabino. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
